scripts.build: yarn workspace @streamlit/lib build && yarn workspace @streamlit/app build
scripts.buildFast: yarn workspace @streamlit/lib build && yarn workspace @streamlit/app buildFast
scripts.test: yarn workspace @streamlit/lib test && yarn workspace @streamlit/app test
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace @streamlit/lib typecheck && yarn workspace @streamlit/app typecheck
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @streamlit/lib lint && yarn workspace @streamlit/app lint
